name: CANVA
description: Create stunning designs, manage assets, collaborate on projects, and access brand templates using simple chat commands.

scopes.asset:read: View the metadata for the user's assets, such as uploaded images
scopes.asset:write: Upload, update, or delete assets on the user's behalf
scopes.brandtemplate:content:read: Read the content of the brand templates associated with the user's brand
scopes.brandtemplate:meta:read: View the metadata of the brand templates associated with the user's brand
scopes.collaboration:event: Receive webhook notifications about events relevant to the user
scopes.comment:read: View the comments on the user's designs, and the associated metadata
scopes.comment:write: Create comments and replies on the user's designs
scopes.design:content:read: View the contents of the user's designs
scopes.design:content:write: Create designs on the user's behalf
scopes.design:meta:read: View the metadata of the user's designs
scopes.folder:permission:write: Set, update, or remove permissions assigned to the user's folders
scopes.folder:read: View the metadata and contents of the user's folders
scopes.folder:write: Add, move, or remove the user's folders
scopes.profile:read: Read a user's profile and account information
